name: Blog Generator
description: Creates a blog based on user input (product, tone, keywords) that's optimized for SEO.

appStages.name: Intro
Run
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eBlog Generator\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \u003csection\u003e\n  \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eProvide the required details below to generate a tailored blog post.\u003c/li\u003e\n  \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n  \n\u003c/div\u003e\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Product Name",
              "placeholder": "ex. PromptPilot – ChatGPT Workflow Builder",
              "description": "Enter the name of the product you want the blog generator to create content for.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "product_topic",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Target Audience",
              "placeholder": "ex. students ",
              "description": "Specify the target audience for this product, including relevant groups or individuals.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "target_audience",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Keywords",
              "placeholder": "ex. Generative AI, Productivity, Prompt Engineering",
              "description": "Enter keywords to guide the blog content.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "keywords",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Tone",
              "placeholder": "ex. Friendly ",
              "description": "Enter the tone you\u0027d like the blog to adopt.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "tone",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Blog Length",
              "widget": "choicesjs",
              "placeholder": "Short",
              "description": "Choose the length of the blog.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "data": {
                "values": [
                  {
                    "label": "Short",
                    "value": "short"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Medium",
                    "value": "medium"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Long",
                    "value": "long"
                  }
                ]
              },
              "key": "length",
              "type": "select",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns3",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "data/GENAI/TEST-Prachi/Blog-Generator/",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Generate",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "API",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Generated Blog",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true
    }
  ]
}
